product_name: Swix Starter Alpine Wax and Tool Kit
long_description: The Swix Starter Alpine Wax and Tool kit comes with the supplies you need to keep your skis running fast for a fun day on the slopes. Includes an edge tuner, 40g of fluorinated paste wax, white fibertex buffer and a tuning manual. Easy-to-use, fluorinated Swix F4 Universal paste wax works for all snow conditions, from very wet to very cold; follow up with a brush (sold separately) for smooth gliding. Use the edge tuner to sharpen dulled edges; polish your bases with the fibertex after waxing and brushing. All included items stow conveniently in the case.
short_description: The Swix Starter Alpine Wax and Tool kit comes with the supplies you need to keep your skis running fast for a fun day on the slopes.
